page.title: 05METHODIST CHURCH,THORNSETT
page.content: My mum and dad live in the converted methodist church,it was built in 1903 AD.it was partly a school and a church my dad converted it himself and my mum helped too.When i said it was partly a school it was apart of Thornsett school.Before the methodist church was built there was another one which was smaller but it got knocked down and this one was built instead and it was bigger.the church was made out of stone in 1903.And some of the stones were specially laid by people whose names are engraved on them.The organ in the methodist church was dismantled and taken away to be reconditioned and taken to a church in Hale Barnes.
